In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Physic of Purity" [[Nahida]] ({{Dendro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Wolf Boy" [[Razor]] ({{Electro}}), "Chivalric Blossom" [[Noelle]] ({{Geo}}), and "Trial by Fire" [[Bennett]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
